name: Janjagruti Vidyarthi Sangh

address: Room no.106, Building No. 8A, First Floor

briefDescription: We work with :*  Children (age grp 5-12): Anganwadi, Balwadis, Community Learning Center, Children's Library, Study Classes, Recreation, Rugby Coaching, Dance Class (All these activities are Free of Cost for children). *  Adolescent (agegrp 13-18): a) Special batch for Girls including English Speaking +Computers +Lifeskills Training, Vocational Training-Beautician/Tailoring classes.b) Training with School Teachers/Peer Educators: Promoting healthy lifestyle practices among adolescents, and preventing youth from falling victim to health risk practices. School programs designed to prevent use/abuse of tobacco, alcohol and other substances.c) Emotional Counselings with support of TISS. * Women Empowerment - Financial Empowerment through Vocational Training & Capacity Building-Beautician Classes, Tailoring Course, Trainings as per community need, Various competitions to develop internal skills/qualities like Nutritious food competition, Mahila Milan, Mehandi competitions, Designer Apparels making competition, Saree designing competition etc. *  Various Programs with Community Youth, Men's group like Sports, Trainings like Capacity Building as per community need, Life skills & carrier guidance, Spoken English Classes for working youths.

address: Room No. 106, Building no. 8A, RBT CHS ,
